quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese proverb

quotes.quote: It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Write it. Shoot it. Publish it. Crochet it. Sauté it. Whatever. MAKE.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: It’s no use going back to yesterday, because I was a different person then.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right—for you’ll be criticized anyway.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If we have the attitude that it’s going to be a great day, it usually is.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifier

quotes.quote: Your passion is waiting for your courage to catch up.
quotes.author: Isabelle Lafleche

quotes.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Everything comes to him who hustles while he waits.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Invest in your dreams. Grind now. Shine later.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Greatness only comes before hustle in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Ross Simmonds

quotes.quote: Without hustle, talent will only carry you so far.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Hustle in silence and let your success make the noise.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Self-worth comes from one thing—thinking that you are worthy.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Very often, a change of self is needed more than a change of scene.
quotes.author: A.C. Benson

quotes.quote: Leaders can let you fail and yet not let you be a failure.
quotes.author: Stanley McChrystal

quotes.quote: It’s not the load that breaks you down, it’s the way you carry it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Work hard in silence, let your success be the noise.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
quotes.author: Tim Notke

quotes.quote: If everything seems to be under control, you’re not going fast enough.
quotes.author: Mario Andretti

quotes.quote: The best way to appreciate your job is to imagine yourself without one.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Never stop doing your best just because someone doesn’t give you credit.
quotes.author: Kamari, a.k.a. Lyrikal

quotes.quote: The miracle is not that we do this work, but that we are happy to do it.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Never allow a person to tell you no who doesn’t have the power to say yes.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Go the extra mile. It’s never crowded there.
quotes.author: Dr. Wayne D. Dyer

quotes.quote: We can do anything we want to if we stick to it long enough.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Every champion was once a contender that didn’t give up.
quotes.author: Gabby Douglas

quotes.quote: Opportunities don’t happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: If you obey all the rules, you miss all the fun.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang out.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Never regret anything that made you smile.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If you want to fly, give up everything that weighs you down.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Today is your opportunity to build the tomorrow you want.
quotes.author: Ken Poirot

quotes.quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.quote: It’s not all sunshine and rainbows, but a good amount of it actually is.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: When someone says you can’t do it, do it twice and take pictures.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I didn’t get there by wishing for it, but by working for it.
quotes.author: Estée Lauder

quotes.quote: She remembered who she was and the game changed.
quotes.author: Lalah Deliah

quotes.quote: Be happy with what you have while working for what you want.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Sunshine all the time makes a desert.
quotes.author: Arabic proverb

quotes.quote: You don’t need to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Do the best you can. No one can do more than that.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: It’s never too late to be what you might’ve been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Trust yourself that you can do it and get it.
quotes.author: Baz Luhrmann

quotes.quote: Don’t let what you can’t do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You can do anything you set your mind to.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: All we can do is the best we can do.
quotes.author: David Axelrod

quotes.quote: You never know what you can do until you try.
quotes.author: William Cobbett
